column1: Table 6 7: Cost details of Bopitiya Wewa-reservation improvement
1. Dense planting of mixed vegetation comprising Agave/Areca Kumbuk/Mee/ Godapara/Madan /jak/Aththikka/Wal del/Kekuna /Mango/ Guava/ randomly mixed seedlings at 500 mm grid intervals for 400 m2.
2. Apply mulching, organic manure, and NPK fertilizer.
3. Introduction of Bamboo, Vetiver grass, and riparian plants. Covered area 100 m2.
4. Maintain for six months and continue watering for one year as required.
5. Excavate and remove silt materials with a mini excavator of about 300 Cu.m. (Machine hours 30-40)
